reasoning_steps: Step 1: Screened for upstream (E&P) oil & gas corporate acquisitions and upstream asset sales announced between 07/01/2025 and 12/31/2025, then filtered to transactions with disclosed deal value >= $100mm.

Step 2: Verified deal value (USD) and consideration structure (cash/stock/hybrid) from primary sources (company press releases/SEC filings) where available; otherwise used Reuters transaction reports for value and payment type.

Step 3: Validated timing using the public announcement date on the cited source and confirmed E&P relevance by ensuring the target/asset description is upstream producing properties/acreage or an E&P corporate combination (excluding midstream-only and non-oil & gas deals).
